article_title: Dereliction of duty on Capitol Hill
article_text:
Republican Senate leaders have taken partisanship to unprecedented levels

Their refusal to consider the president’s plan to close Guantánamo is egregious

The damage from their actions is not to the president, but to the nation

article_metadata.title: Dereliction of duty on Capitol Hill | Miami Herald

og.description: Remember when Sen. Mitch McConnell, the Republican leader in the Senate, vowed to demonstrate that his party could actually govern rather than merely obstruct? Apparently, neither does Sen. McConnell.
og.title: Dereliction of duty on Capitol Hill
